title: Ashe Chests bugs ?
body: Today I did on Ashe S- but dont give me chests . Its a bug or something else ?

replies.body: It looks like you've already received a mastery chest for Ashe.  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, you can only receive one chest per champion per season.  A reset for this hasn't happened yet, so in the meantime you can see who you've obtained chest with through your profile page showing gold borders around champions you own.  I hope that helps clear things up!
